Public Instance methods

camelize(string)

[Source]

    # File lib/utils/string_utils.rb, line 10
10:     def camelize(string)
11:       result = ""
12:       parts = string.split('_')
13:       result << parts.first.downcase
14:       parts[1..-1].each {|s| result << s.downcase.capitalize}
15:       return result
16:     end
classify(string)

[Source]

    # File lib/utils/string_utils.rb, line 26
26:     def classify(string)
27:       if string.length > 1
28:         class_name =  string[/./].upcase + string[1..-1]
29:       else
30:         class_name = string
31:       end
32:       return class_name.gsub('-', '')
33:     end
underscore(camel_cased_word)

[Source]

    # File lib/utils/string_utils.rb, line 18
18:     def underscore(camel_cased_word)
19:       return camel_cased_word.to_s.gsub(/::/, '/').
20:         gsub(/([A-Z]+)([A-Z][a-z])/,'\1_\2').
21:         gsub(/([a-z\d])([A-Z])/,'\1_\2').
22:         tr("-", "_").
23:         downcase
24:     end
